niebocross.title: NieboCross
niebocross.meta_description: Charity run and Nordic Walking at Bierawka - 12.04.2026 in Nieborowice. Routes 3+ km and 9+ km, 100% of fees for charity.
niebocross.hero_description: Run and Nordic Walking that combine heart, adrenaline, and an amazing route along the Bierawka River. A short 3+ km loop for beginners and a challenging 9+ km cross-country for those who love challenges, and most importantly, everything is for a noble cause.
niebocross.two_routes_desc: We want to bring joy to those who are just starting their sports adventure, and to those looking for a solid dose of adrenaline. Everything is part of our mission: 100% of fees go to support those in need.
niebocross.for_beginners_desc: Short loop for beginner runners and Nordic Walking enthusiasts. Perfect to feel the atmosphere of a real sporting event while supporting a charity cause.
niebocross.for_beginners_point1: Relaxed pace, no rush. Time limit same as for the 9+ km route.
niebocross.for_beginners_point2: Perfect distance to start your adventure with running or Nordic Walking.
niebocross.for_challengers_desc: Technical cross-country route along the Bierawka River. Variable terrain, elevation changes, and beautiful views. Runners and Nordic walkers who like to feel the fire in their legs will be satisfied.
niebocross.for_challengers_point2: Views of Bierawka Valley and shaded forest sections.
niebocross.kids_run_desc: Short, safe races for youngest participants near the start/finish zone.
niebocross.kids_run_point1: Distances: 100 m (younger kids) and 300 m (older kids).
niebocross.charity_desc: Together we support the treatment of animals rescued by
niebocross.otoz_desc1: Inspector for Animal Protection OTOZ ANIMALS â€“ Gliwice performs a social function, receives no remuneration for this â€“ it is charity work.
niebocross.otoz_desc2: Inspectors operate within the scope regulated by the Animal Protection Act.
niebocross.your_logo_desc: Together we can do more for a good cause.
niebocross.adult_run_desc: 100% of entry fee revenue goes to the charity goal.
niebocross.kids_run_fee_desc: 100% of entry fee revenue goes to the charity goal.
niebocross.how_we_support: ðŸ“Š How do we support the charity goal?
niebocross.support_registrations_desc: 100% of entry fee revenue goes to the charity goal.
niebocross.support_tshirts_desc: 10 PLN from each sold t-shirt goes to the cause, the rest covers production costs.
niebocross.support_partners_desc: Support from partners is transferred to the goal after deducting necessary event organization costs, which we try to limit to the minimum necessary.
niebocross.registration_info: Registration and online payments will be available soon. The buttons above will take you to the form and starting list as soon as they are available.
niebocross.bierawka_desc: The event will take place in the picturesque Bierawka River valley. The 9+ km route runs along the river, offering participants beautiful views and technical challenges. Natural single-tracks, root sections, and World War II trenches create an ideal cross-country route for trail running enthusiasts.
niebocross.photo_full_gallery: Full photo gallery by PaweÅ‚ is available
niebocross.heart_crane_desc: The heart symbolizes the charity of the event, and the crane spreads its wings of protection over people dedicating their time to others. Cranes are frequent guests in Nieborowice â€“ in early spring you can hear their loud mating songs, which we hope will accompany participants at the start.
niebocross.start_finish_desc: Main square of Nieborowice village, by the kindergarten.
niebocross.surface_desc: Forest paths, gravel, technical sections with roots. Trail shoes recommended.
niebocross.attractions_desc: Animations and games for children, and a small activity zone at the start/finish.
